# News comment title:
Here Come the Crazy Clinton Conspiracies of the 1990s

# Oldest comment (from the thread):
Since the GOP has no real plan, other than to reduce taxes on the wealthy or at least prevent any tax increase on the wealthy, and reduce "entitlements" as much as possible; they only have these phony scandals to work with.  Sadly, this sort of thing influences their base, who don't seem to have very highly developed critical thinking skills, so that they are then willing to vote against their own self interest in order to save the country from these democratic villains.

# Most liked comment (from the thread):
What does it say about the Republican party when their stalwarts come over to progressive websites and laughably try to change the subject, rather than take an ounce of personal responsibility for the lies and hyperventilation that they breathlessly spread 20 years ago- and are plotting like bratty, unrepentant, unevloved little children to try to spread again?

>>> COMMENT UNDER ANALYSIS<<<


Republicans just don't like Democrats in the White House. GOP's hate of the Clintons's is not different from their hate of President Obama.

>>> END COMMENT <<<
